statements: SELECT * FROM customer_interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint'
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_description FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_description FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(interaction_id) AS average_interaction_id FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING average_interaction_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_content FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM customer_behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY pattern_start_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, pattern_id, pattern_start_date, pattern_end_date FROM customer_behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%loyalty%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_id FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_content IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interaction_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_content FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' AND interaction_content LIKE '%confirm%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description, pattern_start_date FROM customer_behavior_patterns WHERE pattern_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY pattern_end_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_interactions > 5 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(pattern_end_date) AS latest_pattern_end_date FROM customer_behavior_patterns GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY latest_pattern_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, payment_method FROM customer_orders WHERE total_amount >= 100 ORDER BY total_amount;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE payment_method IN ('Credit Card', 'PayPal') AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, feedback_details FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Phone Call') ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM interactions_data ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM interactions_data WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city, country FROM customer_profiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_timestamp, product_id, quantity FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comments FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions_data LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM interactions_data WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, city, country FROM customer_profiles WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM purchase_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating, feedback_comments FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, feedback_comments FROM customers c INNER JOIN feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.interaction_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
